website_summaries.verdict: The flexibility of a flip-up helmet and easy-to-use Bluetooth for a comparatively modest investment.
pros: Light but resilient ABS shell with good ventilation and washable liner
550-yard Bluetooth range with built-in FM receiver, plus usual intercom and smartphone functions, including GPS voice prompt
cons: Helmet isn’t the quietest, which can impact communications
Some problems with sun visor mechanism

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I usually like to add pictures but didnt with this review but it looks exactly as pictured. I bought 2 for my husband and I. We went on a 1100mile each way motorcycle trip on the Road Glide. We stopped many places for fun, drove fast and caught rain. Overall we heard each other great even over 60, 70 mph. I withheld rain and wind. I have a 21-22 head circumference but needed an XL would have loved to be able to go even bigger. We contacted the seller to upgrade our size to XL and it was done with no problem so great customer service. DOT approved and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: ... other similar brands of helmet but this one is great. I would recommend getting the biggest one (xl) ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried other similar brands of helmet but this one is great. I would recommend getting the biggest one (xl) if you have a big head, the helmets are tight to break in on the forehead and seem to run half a size smaller than normal. The intercom function has good range (like 3-5 football fields in scattered line of sight , and gives progressively more static as you approach the range limit... plenty of warning you are getting too far away.
customer_reviews.author: Wendigo

customer_reviews.title: Buy 6 batteries because they die in 6 months!!
customer_reviews.text: The battery for the helmet cost 45 dollars. I have 4 batteries and they all died in 6 months!!! Now I have to buy more batteries???!!! Ridiculous!!! I used it for 3 months and now after 5 months I have no batteries!! I purchased 2 helmets!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks good Build-in bluetooth\FM\Short Range Com Great Covered Mic Ratchet chin strap - I did not realize how much I like this Built-in sunglasses Flip up chin Cons: Wind Noise - My bike does not have a windshield, and this helmet has quite a bit of wind noise. This would not normally be a problem, but I cannot hear the headset at more than 30mph. Helmet size - I used the sizing guide and I was at the high end of large. I bought an XL based on the reviews. The helmet fits, but I can feel pressure points on long rides. I would buy this helmet again given all the options.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSmith

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are good for talking on the phone. Music doesn't sound very good. Wind noise is pretty loud. Cheap but it works.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet will by second for my wife when possible.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. She’ll runs a bit small XL fit tight. So if you have a larger head this might not be the helmet for you. Otherwise vents seem to work my head didn’t get hot when it was 105 out the other day. Bluetooth works great. Sound is very good. Calls come in fine other side did complain about wind noise but could still here me fine. Overall great helmet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is the second helmet I bought. I had one for myself earlier and now for my wife. Great to ride together and talk while riding. The instructions are pretty simple. I had to change the insert due to bit tight size, this was sent right away and I got it in 2 days, great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet // Bad battery design.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same issue with 2 different batteries. Initially I received the helmet and enjoyed the bluetooth features. When I tried to charge the first battery it would not hold a charge.I was sent a replacement and again, initially it worked but I could not charge it. I have used several different charging cables and power adapters. I'm not sure if the cable is proprietary but I can't get either battery to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Works great, comfortable and DOT rated.
customer_reviews.text: This a great product with a great price! Affordable and it works great! I can make calls, receive calls , play music or get directions! My hands are now free to ride and not have to mess with my phone anymore! Bluetooth and it has great speakers in the helmet! It is made very well and fits comfortably ! Try it, you will like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stagecoach, Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Great Durable Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, the person receiving loves the helmet! Says it is very comfortable, blue-tooth lasts for several hours of play time (music and phone) and doesn't seem to have the noise issues in other helmets of similar quality.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The speakers work well although i haven't had them at highway speed yet, they might be a little quiet there. The microphone works well, my wife said she could tell i was on the bike but could hear me clearly and well.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Oles

customer_reviews.title: Product looked good
customer_reviews.text: Got a L size but it is too small for the head to fit in... Also, didnt check the other bluetooth etc. so cannot comment. Also, the gloves and other accessories were missing .. While i brought a similar helmet from another vendor for M size and it fits well and is amazing in its clarity .. Wish this would have worked well .. I had brought it for my son.. Since i have to leave for abroad . Else, would have reordered. Hope to reorder soon when i return in the last week of september but may be, a bigger size say XL.
customer_reviews.author: aynat

customer_reviews.title: Service quality and price
customer_reviews.text: These people have it all. I normally dont take the time to write a review but in this case I have to. I order two if these helmets and given what was offered for the price point I was not expecting much. To my surprise the helmets where everything as advertised. Perfect in every way. The size was not perfect ( as expected ) and customer service not only did return my Email with in hours .... they are going to send me two inserts for a better fit no questions asked. It is refreshing to know there are people who believe in service, quality and price. Thank you fodsports for a great purchasing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Have battery inserted in helmet to begin charging
customer_reviews.text: Just received my helmet today great fit very comfortable and the Bluetooth works great speakers are perfect. Had a few questions for the supplier and they immediately responded and was ready to take action if there was any issues. Definitely recommend this company and plan to use them for all my accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Battery must be connected to helmet to see if it is charging.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet has a nice fit and it looks great. It is a good value for the money. When compared to more expensive helmets, expect more road noise. Sound quality is not the best. It is fine for intercom or phone calls, not great for listening to music. the modular design, visor and shade work great. Interior pads are comfortable. Overall, a good value. As it is usually the case with chinese items, the instructions that come with it are limited and a little vague. And yes, vendors are chinese...so can't just contact them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fig

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Work it for the price. Bluetooth works well and the music play has right volume and you can still hear things surrounding you. Can also take phone calls with perfect sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ash

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a price
customer_reviews.text: I am quite impressed with the setup, everything seems to work with Iphone, one thing would be extremely useful if helmet button could be programmed to activate Siri - it does not recognize my Hey Siri through a helmet mike ;( Also there is no option to carry spare battery, it is not a generic battery but Bluetooth chip with battery in a single box and replacement is sold for $40
customer_reviews.author: Hsugres

customer_reviews.title: Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very good entry helmet! Great customer service with help getting a part for it. Super responsive. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet but gloves sizing is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I received my Amazon order but gloves are small for me. As instruction on papers inside the box I sent email but no response yet. I received helmet helmet is good but the gloves are small it is medium size and I need the large size. I wear medium size gloves but your sizing is wrong so please send me the large size gloves I will return the medium size which I have.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features but cheap overall feel (3.5 stars)
customer_reviews.text: The gloss black plastic scratches/scuffs very easily. not a big deal for me though. The headphones in the helmet are good, though tinny sounding, fine for listening to podcasts while cruising. The bluetooth can get choppy at times, most irritating flaw of the helmet. Sun visor is useful when riding in the afternoon/morning (though I rarely use it since I wear glasses most of the time).
customer_reviews.author: Christian B

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, not phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Visor fogs up real bad at slower speeds, but doesn't seem to be a problem when going faster. Sound works well for music, I have a lot of problems hearing people when on phone call. As expected there is wind sound for people I am speaking with. Also dislike that there isn't a way to ignore phone calls, it just automatically answers after 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with a lot of features but the speakers in the helmet aren’t very loud. I’d get the helmet size you normally wear, I upsized like their product page said and my helmets kind of loose. Other than that though the helmet seems pretty durable and weighs about the same as other modular helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Suprised
customer_reviews.text: The pros this helmet fit amazing the controls are easy to use while riding and if your not riding against the wind sound quality is great up to about 70mph Cons if your riding against the wind sound quality takes a hit you can still talk to someone if your doing about 45mph but for the price it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Never had a blue tooth before. Looked around, read reviews and decided to go with this helmet. Very happy with it. I wanted a smoked visor so I contacted the company and the sent me one right out! I am completely happy with the helmet and company!
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Original I was disappointed as in less than a month and a half the visor clip is broke so the visor keeps unclipping and coming off..... I don’t even ride every day. However the company customer service was amazing. After reading my review they personally reached out to me rectify the situation and I have not had any problems since then
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Foxx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This helm met is great. The customer service is equally amazing. I whole heartedly recommend this to anyone needing a helmet. It's comfortable, well fitting and the Bluetooth/FM rafio is plenty loud. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love our new helmets!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits great and is very comfortable! Great customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: JKL

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't sync with Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to sync with my Note 8, tried everything. No contact information available either. I do not reccomend unless you can be reassured it will work 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: It protec, but it also attac
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet! It's the first helmet I've ever bought, but the dual visors are amazing! All the moving parts work great. The speakers are not like Bose speakers by any means, but the unit works perfectly. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is nice, but I purchased this primarily for the Bluetooth feature. When making calls the sound is great, and the other party can hear me very well even at high speed on the bike. However, when playing the media, it is terrible. Very wiry sound, no base at all and very hard to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Siamak Masoudi

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had other helmets , bought this one for the bluetooth and communication capability but was surprised by the quality and comfort . As soon as i unpacked it, i connected it to my phone, connected to the other helmet (i bought 2) and we went for a ride. We were able to communicate , listen to music (switching between the intercom and the bluetooth was easy). The helmet and the gloves was a little to tight, but i contacted the seller and they promptly sent a liner replacement and gloves in the right size. Great helmet! Great customer service. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Kekew

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Comfortable, cool, sound quality is good, helmet to helmet works like a charm. But it only works on freedconn helmets. It won't connect to other brand helmets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor ear phones and communication
customer_reviews.text: The funny Thing is people can hear u ..BUT UCANT HEAR THEM AND U CAN Barely hear your music..this helmet Had no purpose unless you’re riding in the city and still poor sound..
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable helmet I’ve ever worn. The intercom worked fine from Ohio to Tennessee and about half of the next day. It left a mark on my forehead and was unbearable after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Wills dad

customer_reviews.title: First real helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is cool. The face plastic holders are a little weak. Do not drop.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: The helmet it self is really good. But..... It does run small. I may have to return for a bigger size. If the padding was a little better might not be such a issue. Forhead gets sore after about 30 minutes. As far as the Bluetooth... Excellent 😊. I can hear everything just fine. Music and phone calls and talk to my passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dever

customer_reviews.title: Got two
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is medium, battery life is good, Just think its a little high on the price, but i do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Repp

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this helmet, it's too bulky and kinda heavy. Also the Bluetooth isn't that great and nor are the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ari312

customer_reviews.title: wear it on three different ways
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tie on the chip but is good fit. contact email FreedConn if you problem, I satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The inner padding could be a little more comfortable the sound quality of the speakers are pretty good. I would buy these again for this price fast shipping came a day early
customer_reviews.author: Kevylee

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a a little loose around my chin. So when I ride the helmet wobbles a little at high speed. Blue tooth works great. Wind noise starts to make hearing very difficult around 60mph. Slower than that and I can hear just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that helmet very good product
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it and took me awhile to understand how it works but after I did that it works perfectly love it we'll buy another one
customer_reviews.author: laurington

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works perfectly streaming from my iPhone to the helmet - Harley Sportster with loud pipes andI can hear volume with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great!! The blue tooth works as advertised. The medium liner was too small for my head so I asked for a large liner and was at my door in two days so highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ghost

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight at first, but works great love the radio but can be a bit of a pain to get it to connect to other helmets, and change from call to gps to radio. But nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: One great helmet
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well, the speaker are loud, me dislike is that it’s very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Furman Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable to wear on long rides
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable to wear on long rides, and not too heavy. Only bad thing is when the music is up sounds kinda distorted but still able to understand
customer_reviews.author: Quyet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and Bluetooth was simple to set up and works oustanding
customer_reviews.author: Donald G Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the this helmet! You can’t beat the price and get everything in one; bluetooth, modular, comfort, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Bluetooth helmet , great for winter time travel. It is very warm inside the helmet, although fog may develop on the cover if you don’t buy the right size helmet. The Bluetooth features are great in that the radio is incorporated into the system. The battery is sensitive, so plug in carefully.
customer_reviews.author: keith frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great seller okay helmet
customer_reviews.text: They are a little small, and there's a couple of audio issues but nothing major. However the store that sold it was amazing. A piece of the visor bracket broke within a couple of days send a message and the store replaced it no questions asked and quickly. Very happy with the seller
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Helmet
customer_reviews.text: It is a good helmet but when you are at hi speeds you can’t hear your music. The speakers aren’t the best but they sound ok.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet and impressive customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is great and perfectly fits to my head !!! Unfortunately the free gloves were a bit small. I thus contacted the supplier and within a few hours he was sending me a new set of gloves !!!! Thank you very much for this great reactivity and customer service !!!
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and music clear on long road trip Works well with gps May purchase second for wife
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: hello, very good product, does the job but guessing how to operate the bluetooth not fun... if there's a manual anyone may let me have i will really appreciate it, tks! Ok! Guess what?!?! so stupid! I went through the manual and all instructions are there! sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it excellent pr
customer_reviews.text: Great product fits great love it I ride my motorcycle every day but have never felt as safe as I did today it is nice to have a perfect fitting helmet
customer_reviews.author: Chris Webb

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't work or charge right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Great quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Sound quality is better than expected. Lots of vents for exceptional ventilation. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: janice elise holland

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very well crafted helmet for motorcycles and its comfortable as well as secure. On thing is i wish i would have ordered 1 size smaller its a little lose on me. But other then that i would highly recommend this helmet to anyone an ever one.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet that not only looks cool but provides everything i was looking in a helmet. The sound system is high end quality but still serves its purpose. Comfortable and does not feel too heavy. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro W Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Used helmet for snowmobiling with group . Very clear n loud music and communication. Great deal...
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Reordered
customer_reviews.text: 1st ordered a Large and received a Medium and wrong color white instead of black. 2nd order received as requested.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use - Can’t get the blue tooth working
customer_reviews.author: Lew Wagerly

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.. was a perfect fit.... setting up the bluetooth was very easy! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruba Saleh

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is Great gloves are too small but look cool wish they fit better
customer_reviews.author: Stevie m.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not like a normal head phone set up
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits great! Sound is a little odd in that the right speaker is full sound and the left is like surround. Overall seems good
customer_reviews.author: aaron riffe

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, okay sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok but if you go on the highway a lot like I do, you can’t hear it great and it is a tinny sound, but not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good helmut bluetooth not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Pairing and using the blutooth I found very difficult. Instructions were very vague and could not get a phone number to get help. The helmut itself is very good though but ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: France St-Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet fits perfect and deffinetly makes you feel safe. Sound is good and loud but not over powered.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Welp
customer_reviews.text: I really wouldn’t know how well the helmet is, i bought it for an ex and he’s gone so; you guys tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Amenden

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Best full face I’ve tried. Easily connected to my phones Bluetooth and my husbands helmet. Doesn’t feel bulky or heavy when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got medium size gloves I was wondering if I can get a larger size they're kind of tight and don't fit the medium sized ones. Other than that I love the items there so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I measured my head as per the guide and it was still uncomfortably small and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Won’y charge
customer_reviews.text: I can not charge the helmet I ran it off of the charge it came with and tried to charge it and the indicator does not light up. I tried just letting it charge anyway but it did not work. It does make a noise when it get plugged into tho
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Alford

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: paired up fast and easy however am/fm radio volume is low no biggie though i got a loud stereo on my bike
customer_reviews.author: TONTZV

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is great and the Bluetooth works perfectly... however it’s a bit tight. I ordered the largest size helmet available (XL) but it’s still a tight fit...
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Constructed cheaply. But will pass as a helmet
customer_reviews.text: Cheap helmet but looks cool. Lots of noise from airflow. Bluetooth does not work. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So good! Love it! The callers on the other end say they can hear themselves echo a little bit, but they can hear me great & sound quality inside the helmet is good! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cancilla

customer_reviews.title: 😶
customer_reviews.text: Got a xl but the bottom of mouth guard on helmets hits my teeth Would get a headache after 20min of wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: This helmet runs small. Bluetooth works ok to talk, and if you’re listening to music it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Good budget Bluetooth helmet
customer_reviews.text: To overcome wind noise: Wear with foam ear plugs. Turn volume up full. Adjust volume down at lower speeds. Fantastic below 60mph. Utilitarian above 60.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Its a great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love the Helmet. I just never received the riding gloves with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it even tho it took a minute to figure out how to hook it up to the phone
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with gloves and no charge. Wtf. O stars
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore v Iemmiti

customer_reviews.title: Wind
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use fits good only thing is when you ride fast the wind doesn’t allow you to listen to the music so much a lil .
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: JUNK BUY SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of crap. The visor came off while riding down the road. Buy something else. TOTAL junk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet love it CONs- charging Outlet wears e z
customer_reviews.author: DBall540

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Needs upgraded speakers. With 2 visors tends to fog up easily. Decent helmet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ROY D. MERCER

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, but poor Bluetooth quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet. But I really wanted a quality Bluetooth module. The usb port fell inside the unit so you cannot charge it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Davin L.

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth works good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. wind noise is not bad.. haven't tried phone calls at high speed yet but helmet to helmet is good
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: NG
customer_reviews.text: It did NOT connect with my other blue tooth helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Venable

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet kinda hard to link with other helmets but once connected great communication
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great for side by side
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, use them In our side by side .perfect for talking with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Easy to use. Only thing is that it's a little hard to talk on the phone with while riding. They have a hard time hearing you
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Larson

customer_reviews.title: Helmet to Helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet works perfect for us! My husband and.m I can talk to each other with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Marrian Boone

customer_reviews.title: Everything working
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like that a vent switch is broken considering it was $200...
customer_reviews.author: stevan

customer_reviews.title: weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit securely like most high dollar helmets. The chin strap is in a weird position
customer_reviews.author: james saltaformaggio

customer_reviews.title: No battery
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money i will be sending this back came with no battery or manual
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pearcy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a good helmet but the battery charging port is weak.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth isn’t to good cuts in and out a lot
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

product_meta.title: FreedConn Motorcycle Bluetooth Helmets, Modular Flip up Dual Visors Full Face Helmets, DOT Approved Helmet, Built-in Mp3 FM Radio Integrated Intercom Communication System
product_meta.description:
BLUETOOTH HELMET FOR MOTORCYCLE/ SNOWMOBILE/ SKIING

supports 3 riders pairing / 2 riders talking at the same time intercom range up to 500 meters

DSP Echo cancellation and noise suppression technology offers high quality voice

 

V3.0 +EDR BLUETOOTH MODULAR HELMET

support MP3 music, FM radio and GPS voice prompt

Multi-tasking technology - incoming calls overrides intercom, music and navigation audio

Listen to stereo music via Bluetooth enabled device, like cell phone, MP3 with A2DP, supports playback control to achieve play/ pause/ previous song/ next song via AVRCP

 

DOT MODULAR MOTORCYCLE HELMET TO PROTECT YOUR HEAD

Passed DOT Safety Standard comes with BQB and CE Certification

 

EASY OPERATED COMFORTABLE FULL FACE MOTORCYCLE HELMET

One touch control for call answering ( auto receive), rejecting and last number redial

Fully washable microfiber liner and 3-dimensional ventilation system to ensures maximum airflow, offers you comfortable wearing experience

 

Removable Liner

 

M - 57-58cm, 22.4-22.8 inches, hat size 7.1-7.3)

 

L - 59-60cm, 23.2-23.6 inches, hat size 7.4-7.5)

 

XL - 61-62cm, 24-24.4 inches, hat size 7.6-7.8)

 

【KIND REMIND】

1. Measured by hand, please accept 1-2cm deviation. If it doesn't fit well, CONTACT TO US for extra size LINER

2. Please fully charge it before first use and charge it once a month regularly if you're not using it for a long time

 

UPGRADE Bluetooth Helmet Motorcycle Package

1x Helmets Motorcycle Bluetooth

1x Helmet Bag, 1x USB Cable, 1x User Manual

1x Gloves ( GIFT, same size as helmet)

【NOTE】Adapter is NOT included (it can be charged by any phone adapter)

feature_bullets: [ 3.0 Bluetooth Motorcycle Helmets ] : Equipped with Bluetooth 3.0 version ,keep you connected with cellphone, music player and GPS system easily and stably. Up to 9 hours intercom time, 12 hours phone time, 120 hours standby time, makes team motorbike communication more convenient and efficient.What's more we had meets and exceeds both ECE & DOT safety standards.

[ Easy Control Motorbike Bluetooth helmet ]: The motorcycle bluetooth helmet supports one button control for calling, answering, rejecting incoming calls and redialing. Incoming phone call overrides intercom, music, FM and GPS navigation audio. You can trigger Siri or Android voice command by long press the MFB button for 2 seconds. make your communication more convenient.

[ Powerful communication Bluetooth helmet ]: Built-in bluetooth intercom function, supports 2 riders talking or 3 riders pairing and up to 500m(1640 ft), Built in 2 premium speakers with full stereo sound. Advanced DSP echo cancellation and noise suppression technology,The Modular bluetooth helmet offers you clear music and intercom voice even at high speed.

[ comfortable Modular motorcycle Bluetooth helmet ]: Lightweight shell with advanced ventilation system,make your ride more comfortable. Cheek pads and liner are deodorant, absorbent and removable, easy to clean.【Notice】if the size doesn't fit well, please be free contact with us, we will send you bigger or smaller liner.

【Notice】 When the helmet Bluetooth system hasn’t been used for a long time, the battery will enter deep sleep mode. So the Bluetooth system may not be available. To wake the battery up, charge the battery for about half an hour. Please fully charge it before first use and charge it once a month regularly if you're not using it for a long time. please CONTACT US by clicking"Fodsports Direct" →"Ask A Question", we will be back to you in 12 HOURS.
